messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: The Hunger Games is an event that happens every year. The Capitol uses it to remind the districts that they are being punished for fighting against them in the past. Every year, one boy and one girl between the ages of 12 and 18 are chosen from each district. They are chosen by lottery to compete in a battle where only one person can survive. The chosen teenagers are called "tributes". Tributes are the people who are selected to fight in the games. The whole country must watch the event on TV.
